body: Wtf theres a swastika character on Moron.. er.. Boron's comment.   I didn't even know that was a thing.  Fucking neo-nazis all over the goddamn place. Just today I saw an article on MLK Jr, and 2/3 of the comments were like "I'm glad that nigger is dead!" I guess they felt really threatened by a completely non-violent preacher.  So did J Edgar Hoover, apparently. Its fairly obvious Hoover had him killed, and for years after his death Hoover continued to slander him (with mostly true things, but still.) Hoover said MLK was a pervert- which is kinda funny coming from a crossdresser who would have 1 young schoolboy read the Bible to him as another sucked him off. (True Story). Also, he amassed the worlds biggest personal porn collection, and ran a pedo-blackmail and assassination racket while he was the Director of the FBI for 48ish years. COINTEL-PRO was his baby, and that shit was FUCKED. Biggest embarrassment for the Feds *ever*.
Mildest Anmo Night ever. Still hot though
phew, anmo night, this is gonna get some rage going...
Nice to see old snuff translated
